title: I Spy With My Little Eye
description: Look through this eye-catching bookâ€™s special spy hole to discover a world of animal colors!Have you ever played the I-spy game? Debut artist Edward Gibbs takes the game to a whole new level in this picture book with spy holes. Peeking through the pages, children will be able to spot a different colored animal every time, and guess what it is using a simple, factual clue. Bold illustrations and die-cut holes will absorb young readers as they learn about colors and animal names.
author: Edward Gibbs
